title: Topic 001 Question 197
body: You have some Terraform code and a variable definitions file named dev.auto.tfvars that you tested successfully in the dev environment. You want to deploy the same code in the staging environment with a separate variable definition file and a separate state file.
Which two actions should you perform? (Choose two.)
options: Copy the existing terraform.tfstate file and save it as staging.terraform.tfstate
Write a new staging.auto.tfvars variable definition file and run Terraform with the  var-file=”staging.auto.tfvars” flag
Create a new Terraform workspace for staging
Create a new Terraform provider for staging
Add new Terraform code (*.tf files) for staging in the same directory
